author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-2013 Support relative home property. To be resolved against sling.home if present or against current user directory if sling.home is not set. Also support default assumption (repository.xml is configuration inside home directory) if config property is missing or empty.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-2065 save ShutdownHook thread reference in case we want to remove it in doStop() method.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-2065 Remove ShutdownHook in stop() method. The hook was added in case the application 'forgets' to call stop().

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-2002 - rough conversion of index page
